meanings.definition: One piece at a time; gradually
meanings.sent1: She slowly put together the puzzle piecemeal.
meanings.sent2: The project was completed piecemeal over several weeks.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathered nuts piecemeal, storing them in different places.
meanings.sent4: Her memories came back piecemeal, like scattered puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The old house was renovated piecemeal, room by room.

meanings.definition: Done or made in stages or steps
meanings.sent1: The piecemeal approach to the problem helped break it down into manageable parts.
meanings.sent2: The piecemeal construction of the building ensured attention to detail at each stage.
meanings.sent3: His piecemeal progress on the painting made it a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The piecemeal growth of the plant symbolized patience and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The piecemeal nature of the plan allowed for adjustments along the way.

meanings.sent1: The vase fell and broke piecemeal on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The old book was falling apart piecemeal.
meanings.sent3: The story was told piecemeal, with missing pages here and there.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams shattered piecemeal, leaving her feeling lost.
meanings.sent5: The old castle crumbled piecemeal, revealing its ancient history.
